name: Wings Aviation Academy
about: Wings Aviation Academy, located at Rabigh Domestic Airport near Jeddah International Airport, offers a comprehensive portfolio of aviation training. Our programs include training on traditional and glass-cockpit aircraft such as the Cessna 172 and Tecnam P2006T, equipped with Garmin 1000 glass cockpits. Our Professional Pilot Program provides a structured career path, allowing aspiring commercial pilots to progress and potentially work as flight instructors. Training is conducted in a dynamic and open airspace, reducing costs and maximizing flight time. We offer full-time and part-time courses tailored to individual needs, ensuring students gain the confidence and skills to operate in any airspace. Our goal is to prepare future pilots for the realities of commercial aviation with high-quality training and real-world experience.
services:

Grooming & Personality Development
